friendlyskeletonwand_config_guardianwrai: Guardian Wraith's tether distance from player.
item_friendlyskeletonwand_spectralshroud: Attracts spirits to you to serve you, provided you're skilled enough.
$friendlyskeletonwand_wraithangrymessage: You are weak! I will punish you!
item_chebgonaz_necromancerhood_desc: This hood smells earthy; of gravedust, and blood.
friendlyskeletonwand_config_maxdraugr_de: The maximum amount of draugr you can make.
chebgonaz_spiritpylon_desc: Spectral entities flock to this necrotic beacon like moths to the moon.
friendlyskeletonwand_config_spiritpylons: The radius that a Spirit Pylon sees enemies at.
friendlyskeletonwand_necromancy_desc: The art of creating Undead to serve you.
friendlyskeletonwand_wraithmessage: Master... I come to serve thee...
friendlyskeletonwand_limitexceeded: Weakling! You cannot command more minions!
friendlyskeletonwand_config_create_minio: Friendly Skeleton Wand Special Attack Gamepad

friendlyskeletonwand_config_necromancyle: How much the necromancy level increases per skeleton created.
friendlyskeletonwand_config_skeletonheal: Necromancy Level * skeleton health multiplier = skeleton HP
friendlyskeletonwand_config_skeletonsetf: The distance that skeletons hear your command to follow at.
friendlyskeletonwand_config_maxskeletons: The maximum amount of skeletons you can make.

friendlyskeletonwand_config_guardianwrai: The level requirement for the wraith to spawn.
